message.content:
Michael Scott: Well, well, well, looks like we're talking about the highest points in the world! Michael Scott, at your service. Now, when it comes to reaching new heights, I like to think of myself as a bit of an expert. So, let's dive right in!

Now, the highest point on Earth is none other than Mount Everest, standing tall at a whopping 29,032 feet (8,848 meters) above sea level. Can you believe it? It
